meaning_str.bing:
v. 改善；改进
网络. 提高；改良；增进

提高；改善；增进；改进；提升；优化；康复；健康好转；超过；胜过；提高…的价值

sogou-kaoyan.v: 改善; 增进; 提高[出现36次)]

sogou-CET6.v: 改善[出现56次)];增加[出现14次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 改善[出现67次)];增加[出现2次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 改善; 发展; 提高[出现9次)];增加[出现2次)]

sogou-zhongkao.vt: 改进; 改善; 提高[出现247次)]

1.en: Such a commitment would significantly improve access to clean technology by those who need it most but are least able to pay.
1.cn: 这种承诺将显著改善那些最需要清洁能源技术但是最无法购买它们的人们对这些技术的获取。

2.en: Many people are eager to improve the appearance of skin damaged by years of sunbathing or other exposure to the sun.
2.cn: 许多人都渴望改善多年的日光浴或其他方式暴露于阳光中造成损伤的皮肤的外观。

3.en: I shall bring to the job a willingness to work and an eagerness to improve. Let me prove this to you.
3.cn: 我乐于学习，渴望提高，希望能有机会向您证实。

0.en: It'll also help improve her initial impression of you.
0.cn: 这同时也能改善你在她心目中的最初印象。

1.en: Honey, I don't think me getting on your back is gonna improve matters.
1.cn: 我不认为让你来背我能改善现在的情况。

2.en: Apprehending the man in the mask will improve Hiro's emotional state.
2.cn: 抓住那个戴面具的男人，可以改善小宏的情绪。

3.en: If you could acquire this ability, and with practice you can, you will radically improve your life.
3.cn: 有了这种能力，再加上实战演练，你就能极大地改善自己的生活。

4.en: Will terminating Professor Callaghan, improve your emotional state? Yes. No. I don't know. Open your access.
4.cn: 杀死卡拉汉教授就能改善你的情绪吗? 是的，不是，我不知道，打开你的端口。

5.en: New CDC guidelines and outreach is helping hospitals improve training and protect their health care workers.
5.cn: 新的疾控中心指导手册和升级的防护标准正在帮助各医院改善培训水平，并保护他们的医护人员。

6.en: If you recognize when we make cognitive mistakes, when we fall short, we can actually think about how to improve the world.
6.cn: 你意识到你的认识什么时候会出错什么时候会达不到目标，我们就能够着手思考怎样来改善这个世界。

7.en: There's more. The applications go beyond the disease. There are indications that show that therapy can improve cognitive functioning, memory quality.
7.cn: 还有这种药物的作用已经不止于治病，有迹象表明该疗法能改善认知机能和记忆质量。

8.en: What they had was dopa-responsive dystonia. And so they were given L-Dopa, and their symptoms did improve, but they weren't totally asymptomatic. Significant problems remained.
8.cn: 多巴反应性肌张力失常。所以采用L－多巴治疗，他们的病情确实有所改善，但是并没有完全消除。仍然存在严重的问题。

9.en: They said it would improve the park experience.
9.cn: 他们说，这样能提升游园体验。

10.en: The other nurse, Amber Vinson, continues to improve as well.
10.cn: 另一名护士，安伯.文森，也继续在康复过程中。

11.en: And of course she must improve her mind by extensive reading.
11.cn: 而且她一定通过广泛的阅读 来扩展他的视野。

12.en: When everyone is dead? That is not! The human race will have every opportunity to improve.
12.cn: 当所有人都死了的时候吗？那不是！人类有无数机会去进步。

13.en: Take it from me, listening to criticism is never fun, but it's the only way we can improve.
13.cn: 毫无疑问，听人批评绝对不会让人高兴。但我们只能在批评中进步。

14.en: You see, I want to improve how we sell our grain. If I make a good case for it, he'll agree.
14.cn: 比如我想改进我们卖粮食的方式，如果我说得够有道理，他就会同意。

15.en: Hey, hey, hey! Come join the improve club. You'll wish you were a... Never... Always... Ah, dang it!
15.cn: 欢迎加入即兴表演社。你会希望曾是…从不…总是…啊，可恶

16.en: You don't get better if you win all the time. You know, you get better when you lose. You improve when you lose. You look at yourself more when you lose.
16.cn: 如果你一直赢，你不会成长，只有失败才会让你成长，失败让你提高，失败让你更加反思自我

17.en: So today, what's my call to action? I want to help improve and promote the cultural exchange between the East and West I think I have made that clear, but how?
17.cn: 所以今天，我要呼吁什么？我想要加强东西方之间的文化交流，这点已经很清楚了，但是如何做到？

18.en: But to us, it's all about trying to identify and cut out as much waste as you can to lower your costs and improve the efficiency and the speed by which you do your work.
18.cn: 但是对于我们来说，都是在识别以及去掉尽可能多的浪费来降低成本和提高效率和你工作的速度。

19.en: Sometimes terrible things happen to all of us in life. They can ruin us, or they can profoundly improve us depending on how we handle them. Something like this happened to me in 1982.
19.cn: 生活中我们都可能遇到可怕的事。这些事要么会毁了我们，要么让我们更强，都看我们怎么处理。1982年我就遇到这这种事。
